K06D0030_H0031:266b-1: a'arya pra dzny'a pa ra mi t'a badzra ke tu mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-3: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
K06D0030_H0031:266b-4: rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo theg pa chen po
K06D0030_H0031:266b-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K06D0030_H0031:266b-7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na; bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-8: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang thabs cig go /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-9: de nas de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa'
K06D0030_H0031:266b-10: rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dug pa de stan las langs
K06D0030_H0031:266b-11: te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to
K06D0030_H0031:266b-13: chos gang dang ldan pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags //
K06D0030_H0031:266b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-16: chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pa ste /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-19: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mngon pa dang /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-20: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa dang /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-21: sdug bsngal bar shes pa dang /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-22: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i chos nyid du ldan pa dang /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-23: thams cad du mi rtog mi dmigs par bsgom pa'o //
K06D0030_H0031:266b-24: gzhan yang chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan na /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-25: shes rab skye ba'i rgyu ste /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-28: dang po gang zag chos smra ba'i mkhan po bsten pa dang /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-29: gnyis pa de'i dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /
K06D0030_H0031:266b-30: gsum pa don la 'jug cing sems pa dang /
K06D0030_H0031:267a-1: la tshul bzhin du ston par mos pa ste /
K06D0030_H0031:267a-5: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di lta ste /
K06D0030_H0031:267a-6: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas stong pa dang /
K06D0030_H0031:267a-8: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
K06D0030_H0031:267a-13: mun pa med pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
K06D0030_H0031:267a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
K06D0030_H0031:267a-16: chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /
K06D0030_H0031:267a-17: gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
K06D0030_H0031:267a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06D0030_H0031:267a-19: dngos med ngo bo nyid du bsgom //
K06D0030_H0031:267a-20: shes rab skye ba'i rgyu la mos //
K06D0030_H0031:267a-21: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i //
K06D0030_H0031:267a-22: shes rab don la bslab par bya'o //
K06D0030_H0031:267a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
K06D0030_H0031:267a-24: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan la sogs
K06D0030_H0031:267a-27: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom
K06D0030_H0031:267a-28: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do
